artist: John Piper Printed by Kelpra Studio, Ltd., London Published by Marlborough Fine Arts Ltd., London
creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: three panels, each with a square tower; each tower slightly different with different number and placement of windows, different archways at base of tower; colors primarily dark red, black and a grayish bluewith white accents
marks: Signature and Edition LR, in pencil: [John Piper]
title: Three Somerset Towers
